post.text:
Como candidato, Donald Trump ya nos está avergonzado ante el resto del mundo.

Imagínate como presidente.

comment.author: Nicole
comment.text: Trump is a mess he think with his feet and not with the brain any country deserve respect and not ply with international diplomacy. Education and experience in any field, that´s what America needs.. Mrs. Hillary Clinton, President 2016.

replies.author: Christopher
replies.text: God help us with all her corruption. Do you really want a thief , liar and someone who is filled w so much deceit to run our country. The world thinks we are a joke
